about_the_game:
Nightclub Simulator: Manage the Party, Become the King of Fun!

Are you ready to step into the heart of nightlife? With Nightclub Simulator, create, manage, and elevate your very own nightclub. From DJs to security and drink service, control every detail and create the most popular spot in town!

Dance Floor

In Nightclub Simulator, the dance floor is the heart of your club. Hire the best DJs, carefully curate your playlists, and get your guests dancing. Energize the atmosphere with different music styles and special light shows. Create an environment where everyone is dancing and the fun reaches its peak. Keep the energy high in your club because the rhythm of nightlife beats here!





Drink Service

In Nightclub Simulator, drink service is the key to satisfying your guests. Run your bar by offering a variety of drinks and cocktails to enrich the atmosphere of your club. From classic drinks to special recipes, provide a wide menu and select the best bartenders. Impress your guests with the right drink combinations and ensure they have an unforgettable night at your club!



Inventory Management

In Nightclub Simulator, inventory management is a cornerstone of your club's success. Regularly track all your stocks from drinks to supplies and anticipate shortages in advance. Optimize your storage arrangement to provide fast and efficient service. Manage costs and minimize waste by keeping stock levels under control. Prevent disruptions and always be prepared with good inventory management!



Dancers

In Nightclub Simulator, dancers are key elements that enhance the charm of your club. Hire professional and talented dancers to captivate your guests. Add energy to the night with different dance styles and impressive choreography. Carefully plan the dancers' performances and support their shows with stage lights. The excitement created by the dancers will invigorate your club's atmosphere and offer your guests an unforgettable entertainment experience!



Key Features

Unique Venue Designs: Personalize your club's interior and create an atmosphere that suits your style. Modern, retro, or futuristic – the choice is yours!

DJ and Music Management: Hire the best DJs, manage playlists, and get your guests dancing. Define your music style and reflect the soul of your club.
Bar and Drink Management: Run your bar, offer a variety of drinks and cocktails to satisfy your guests. Stand out with special recipes!

Security and Customer Satisfaction: Ensure security to create a peaceful environment. Manage customer complaints and maintain your club's reputation.

Events and Promotions: Organize special events, attract more customers with promotional campaigns, and increase your club's popularity.
Realistic Simulation: Face all the challenges of nightclub management and make strategic decisions to achieve success.

Why Nightclub Simulator?

Nightclub Simulator takes you on a journey into the dynamic world of nightlife. Test your management skills while also showcasing your creativity in this game that offers hours of fun with a realistic simulation experience. Successfully manage your club and step by step become the most popular spot in town.

It's time to light up your club! Welcome your guests, start the party, and reach the heights of fun in Nightclub Simulator!

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game contains some mature content. This includes partial nudity of dancing female characters and active alcohol consumption. The game does not include explicit sexual content, sexual assault, drug use, or self-harm.

Please consider this information when evaluating our game.

name: NightClub Simulator 25

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: i5-2500 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX or AMD Radeon Radeon R7 260X series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Step into the vibrant world of nightlife! Create, manage, and customize your very own nightclub. From hiring staff and organizing events to setting the perfect atmosphere with music and lighting, every choice you make will shape your club. Are you ready to become the ultimate nightclub tycoon?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
